bigshot

Class Point2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • bigshot.Point2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Point3D

    public class Point2D
extends Object
    A mutable 2D point

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double x
      The x-coordinate.
      double y
      The y-coordinate.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point2D()
      Creates a new 2d point with coordinates (0, 0).
      Point2D(double x, double y)
      Creates a new 2d point with the given coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double norm()
      The euclidean distance of the point to the origin.
      void rotate(double angle)
      Rotates the point around the origin.
      void scale(double s)
      Scales the point relative to the origin.
      String toString()
      Formats the point on the form [x, y].
      void translate2D(double dx, double dy)
      Translates the point.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double angle)
        Rotates the point around the origin.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle in radians

      • scale

        Scales the point relative to the origin.
        Parameters:
        s - the scale factor

      • translate2D

        public void translate2D(double dx,
               double dy)
        Translates the point.
        Parameters:
        dx - the amount to move the point along the x-axis
        dy - the amount to move the point along the y-axis
